entities.name: tergeo
entities.description: The wand is used to cast the spell 'Tergeo' to remove grease.

entities.name: grease
entities.description: The substance that needs to be removed from Hermione's handkerchief.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who handed the handkerchief to Hermione and comforted her after Mad-Eye's death.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is the one whose handkerchief was greasy and she was comforting after Mad-Eye's death.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye died and Hermione is mourning his death.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore's death is mentioned as a reference to the recent loss of Mad-Eye.

entities.name: mundungus
entities.description: Mundungus is referred to by Ron as a cowardly little squit.

entities.name: monster book of monsters
entities.description: The book that Hermione dropped on Ron's foot.

entities.name: wand
entities.description: The wand is used to cast the spell 'Tergeo'.

relationships.description: Ron comforted Hermione after Mad-Eye's death.
Hermione dropped the Monster Book of Monsters on Ron's foot.
